verses.name: Jeremiah 24:3
verses.text: Then said the Lord unto me, What seest thou, Jeremiah? And I said, Figs; the good figs, very good; and the evil, very evil, that cannot be eaten, they are so evil.

verses.name: Jeremiah 24:4
verses.text: Again the word of the Lord came unto me, saying,

verses.name: Jeremiah 24:5
verses.text: Thus saith the Lord, the God of Israel; Like these good figs, so will I acknowledge them that are carried away captive of Judah, whom I have sent out of this place into the land of the Chaldeans for their good.
